text: Family Business is a 2019 French web television series created and directed by Igor Gotesman. The plot revolves around a failed entrepreneur, Joseph (Jonathan Cohen), who finds out that cannabis is about to be legalized in France. He consequently decides to change his kosher butcher shop, inherited from his father, into the first marijuana coffeeshop in France. It was ordered direct-to-series, and the first season premiered on Netflix streaming on June 28, 2019. It was quickly renewed for a second season in July 2019 by Netflix and was released on September 11, 2020. Netflix renewed the series for season 3 in October 2020. ==Cast== * Jonathan Cohen as Joseph Hazan * Gérard Darmon as Gérard Hazan * Julia Piaton as Aure Hazan * Ali Marhyar as Ali * Olivier Rosemberg as Olivier * Liliane Rovère as Mammy Hazan * Tamar Baruch as Jaures * Zina Esepciuc as Amsterdam prostitute * Enrico Macias as Himself ==Episodes== ===Season 1 (2019)=== ===Season 2 (2020)=== ==Release== The full first season consisting of 6 episodes premiered on Netflix streaming on June 28, 2019. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:French-language Netflix original programming Category:French comedy television series Category:French drama television series Category:French-language television shows Category:Television series about Jews and Judaism Category:Television shows set in France Category:Television shows set in Paris Category:2010s French television series
title: Family Business (2019 TV series)
